Address.title: Address
Address.description: A Cardano address (either legacy format or new format).

AddressAttributes.title: AddressAttributes
AddressAttributes.description: Extra attributes carried by Byron addresses (network magic and/or HD payload).

AssetQuantity.title: AssetQuantity
AssetQuantity.description: A number of asset, can be negative went burning assets.

BlockHeight.title: BlockHeight
BlockHeight.description: A block number, the i-th block to be minted is number i.

Bound.title: Bound
Bound.description: An era bound which captures the time, slot and epoch at which the era start. The time is relative to the start time of the network.

oneOf.description: A stake delegation certificate, from a delegator to a stake pool and/or a delegate representative.
oneOf.title: StakeDelegation

oneOf.description: A stake credential (key or script) registration certificate. The field 'deposit' is only *optionally* present in Conway onwards.
oneOf.title: StakeCredentialRegistration

oneOf.description: A stake key de-registration certificate. The field 'deposit' is only *optionally* present in Conway onwards.
oneOf.title: StakeCredentialDeregistration
ConstitutionalCommitteeDelegation
oneOf.description: A constitutional committee member delegates a hot credential for voting on-chain. Constitutional committee members do not vote with their cold key directly. New registrations supersedes any preceding ones.

oneOf.title: ConstitutionalCommitteeRetirement
oneOf.description: A constitutional committee member resigns from the committee.
A delegate representative registration. Note that this is only possible for 'registered' representatives and not for well-known ones (abstain & noConfidence)
oneOf.title: DelegateRepresentativeRegistration

oneOf.description: A delegate representative retirement. Note that this is only possible for 'registered' representatives and not for well-known ones (abstain & noConfidence)
oneOf.title: DelegateRepresentativeRetirement

ChainCode.title: ChainCode
ChainCode.description: An Ed25519-BIP32 chain-code for key deriviation.

ConstitutionalCommitteeMember.title: ConstitutionalCommitteeMember
ConstitutionalCommitteeMember.description: A constitutional committee member as seen in the context of a specific epoch. Statuses and next states are to be seen from this specific epoch. The field 'next', when present, refers to any change happening to this member in the following epoch.

status.description: A member status. 'active' indicates that this member vote will count during the ratification of the ongoing epoch. 'unrecognized' means that some hot credential currently points to a non-existing (or no longer existing) member.

Digest<Any>.title: Digest<Any>
Digest<Any>.description: A hash digest from an unspecified algorithm and length.

Digest<Blake2b, 224>.title: Digest<Blake2b, 224>
Digest<Blake2b, 224>.description: A Blake2b 28-byte hash digest, encoded in base16.

type.description: A special delegate representative which always vote no, except on votes of no-confidence.
A special delegate representative which always abstain.

Digest<Blake2b, 256>.title: Digest<Blake2b, 256>
Digest<Blake2b, 256>.description: A Blake2b 32-byte hash digest, encoded in base16.

EraParameters.title: EraParameters
EraParameters.description: Parameters that can vary across hard forks.

EraSummary.title: EraSummary
EraSummary.description: Summary of the confirmed parts of the ledger.

Genesis<Byron>.title: Genesis<Byron>
Genesis<Byron>.description: A Byron genesis configuration, with information used to bootstrap the era. Some parameters are also updatable across the era.

Genesis<Shelley>.title: Genesis<Shelley>
Genesis<Shelley>.description: A Shelley genesis configuration, with information used to bootstrap the era. Some parameters are also updatable across the era.

Genesis<Alonzo>.title: Genesis<Alonzo>
Genesis<Alonzo>.description: An Alonzo genesis configuration, with information used to bootstrap the era. Some parameters are also updatable across the era.

Genesis<Conway>.title: Genesis<Conway>
Genesis<Conway>.description: An Conway genesis configuration, with information used to bootstrap the era. Some parameters are also updatable across the era.

GenesisDelegate.title: GenesisDelegate
GenesisDelegate.description: A Genesis delegate, in charge of Cardano's governance.

GenesisStakePools.title: GenesisStakePools
GenesisStakePools.description: A Genesis stake pools configuration; primarily used for bootstrapping test networks.

oneOf.title: GovernanceAction<ProtocolParametersUpdate>
oneOf.description: The 'ancestor' is a reference to the previous governance action of this group. It is optional for the first one and required after so that they all actions of a same group form a chain.

oneOf.title: GovernanceAction<TreasuryTransfer>
oneOf.description: A transfer from or to the treasury / reserves authored by genesis delegates.

oneOf.title: GovernanceAction<TreasuryWithdrawals>
oneOf.description: One of more withdrawals from the treasury.

oneOf.title: GovernanceAction<ConstitutionalCommittee>
oneOf.description: A change (partial or total) in the constitutional committee. The 'ancestor' is a reference to the previous governance action of this group (also includes no confidence actions in this case). It is optional for the first one and required after so that they all actions of a same group form a chain.

oneOf.title: GovernanceAction<Constitution>
oneOf.description: A change in the constitution. Only its hash is recorded on-chain. The 'ancestor' is a reference to the previous governance action of this group. It is optional for the first one and required after so that they all actions of a same group form a chain.

oneOf.title: GovernanceAction<NoConfidence>
oneOf.description: A motion of no-confidence, indicate a lack of trust in the constitutional committee. The 'ancestor' is a reference to the previous governance action of this group. It is optional for the first one and required after so that they all actions of a same group form a chain.

oneOf.title: GovernanceAction<Information>
oneOf.description: An action that has no effect on-chain, other than an on-chain record

GovernanceVote.title: GovernanceVote
GovernanceVote.description: A vote on a governance proposal. The 'anchor' is optional and 'proposal' is only present from Conway onwards. Before Conway, a vote would always refer to all proposals part of the same transaction.

ExtendedVerificationKey.title: ExtendedVerificationKey
ExtendedVerificationKey.description: An Ed25519-BIP32 Byron genesis delegate verification key with chain-code.

additionalProperties.description: An associated metadatum, as a CBOR bytestring or a JSON object if possible. If not possible, default to 'cbor'. Use --include-metadata-cbor to ALWAYS include the cbor field.

Network.title: Network
Network.description: A network target, as defined since the Shelley era.

NetworkMagic.title: NetworkMagic
NetworkMagic.description: A magic number for telling networks apart. (e.g. 764824073)

OperationalCertificate.title: OperationalCertificate
OperationalCertificate.description: Certificate identifying a stake pool operator.

Origin.title: Origin
Origin.description: The origin of the blockchain. This point is special in the sense that it doesn't point to any existing slots, but is preceding any existing other point.

StakePoolId.title: StakePoolId
StakePoolId.description: A Blake2b 32-byte hash digest of a pool's verification key.

base.description: The base cost for the tier-price calculation.

multiplier.description: The multiplier increasing the cost of each tier.

Ratio.title: Ratio
Ratio.description: A ratio of two integers, to express exact fractions.

RelativeTime.title: RelativeTime
RelativeTime.description: A time in seconds relative to another one (typically, system start or era start).

RewardAccount.title: RewardAccount
RewardAccount.description: A reward account, also known as 'stake address'.

SafeZone.title: SafeZone
SafeZone.description: Number of slots from the tip of the ledger in which it is guaranteed that no hard fork can take place. This should be (at least) the number of slots in which we are guaranteed to have k blocks.

oneOf.title: Native
oneOf.description: A Cardano native script. Use --include-script-cbor to ALWAYS include the 'cbor' field. Omitted otherwise.

Script<Native>.title: Script<Native>
Script<Native>.description: A phase-1 monetary script. Timelocks constraints are only supported since Allegra.

Signatory.title: Signatory
Signatory.description: A signatory (EdDSA) for the transaction. The fields 'chainCode' and 'addressAttributes' are only present on bootstrap signatures (when spending from a Byron/Bootstrap address).

cbor.description: The raw serialized (CBOR) transaction, as found on-chain. Use --include-transaction-cbor to ALWAYS include the 'cbor' field. Omitted otherwise.

TransactionId.title: TransactionId
TransactionId.description: A Blake2b 32-byte hash digest of a transaction body

TransactionOutput.title: TransactionOutput
TransactionOutput.description: A transaction output. 'datum' and 'datumHash' are never present together.

lovelace.description: An amount, possibly negative, in Lovelace (1e6 Lovelace = 1 Ada).
